workshoptitle: Event Streaming With Kafka Java Client for Oracle Database Transactional Event Queues (TxEventQ)

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: The Introduction is always first. The title and contents menu title match for the Introduction.

tutorials.title: Get Started
tutorials.description: This is the prerequisites for customers using their own personal workstation.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Create OKafka Topics in Oracle AI Database
tutorials.description: Learn how to create OKafka topics in Oracle AI Database using the kafka-clients Admin API.

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Produce and Consume Messages With OKafka
tutorials.description: Use kafka-clients Producer and Consumer APIs to publish and receive messages with Oracle AI Database.

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Use Transactional Messaging to Combine Messaging and Database Operations
tutorials.description: Produce and consume messages from Oracle AI Database in the same atomic transaction as SQL inserts, updates, and deletes.

tutorials.title: Lab 4 (Optional): Understand OKafka Authentication to Oracle AI Database
tutorials.description: Learn the required grants and authentication mechanisms for Java clients to authenticate to Oracle AI Database using OKafka.

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
